name: mislabel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to attach the wrong label to something (= a piece of paper, etc. that gives you information): Many boxes were mislabelled or not labelled at all. The medication was mis-labelled.
to describe someone or something in a way that is not correct or fair: People were mislabelled and sent away to mental institutions. Some situations might be mis-labelled as discrimination. Related word
label verb
More examplesFewer examplesIt seems that they mislabelled the container.Members of the group claim to have been misunderstood, mislabelled, and mishandled.The organization claimed that 50% of sparkling wine sold was mis-labelled as Champagne.

Add to word list
Add to word list
to put information that is not correct on something: Because it was mislabeled, the wrong part was sent to us.
